text:
The documentation appears to be describing how to install the old version of 
ant where there was no 'etc' directory.  I don't know if it is needed or what 
to do with it.
creator: jrussell@stanfordalumni.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
/etc contains some goodies, but is not needed by Ant.

Want to supply a patch for the documentation?

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
This is fixed in CVS (ANT_15_BRANCH). It won't make it into beta3
I described a little bit more the directory layout.
